1.content: Welcome to Silver City, known mainly for its impressive buildings and being the home place of Leviathan. Our city has everything from small cafes to large department stores, there are sights and attractions for everyone and if you're lucky, you might even get to see one of our famous superheroes in action. Some of our most famous attractions include the Leviathan Museum and Wolf Rock Park. We hope you enjoy your time here and don't get caught up in the intense battles that occur.
1.title: What Side Are You On?

11.content:
Hello everyone! If you wish to write in this story I have a few rules for you to follow, if you're just reading then these won't bother you but it might be worth reading if you do decide to add to it.

1. No Sex-I have rated this story 13+, meaning that sex can be referred to but no sex scenes are allowed, also remember that most of the characters are teenagers. So please even keep the insinuated sex to a minimum and preferably only between adult characters.

2. Don't kill off characters- Ok, so in all hero stories character are dying and being resurrected every three issues so you can have characters die but don't finish a story at them dying, allow people to continue the story and resurrect the character later on.

3. Follow the 13+ rules- There are a few rules that need to be put in place to keep this story 13+ rating. Mild profanity, gore and violence is allowed but not too much, NO F word or sexual profanity please.

4. Keep Character and Story Options open- So, when you go to choose a character you will have the option to create your own, please always leave an option for someone else to create a different character. For the already existing characters when you start a story with them please leave an option for someone to start a different story.

5. Have Fun!- I mean, that is why we write isn't it?
11.title: Rules were made to be broken, but not these rules!

12.content: So you think you have the guts to be a superhero? We'll see about that, your journey to becoming the strongest member of Leviathan starts now!
12.title: Together We Stand

121.content:
Name: Austin Motto
Nickname: Aussy (Rarely)
Age: 17
Birthday: September 24th
Species: Human/Ussirian
Blood Type: A+
Astrological Sign: Libra (Scales)
Gender: Male
Sexual Orientation: Heterosexual
Past/Bio:
Austin knew very little about his background. According to the owner of the orphanage he grew up in Austin was left at the doorstep of the orphanage when he was a baby with nothing but a note that had his name on it. For many years Austin accepted that he would never know his true parents however eventually he did start wondering about them, why would they leave him? Were they still alive? Would he ever be able to find them? It made Austin feel so useless that he couldn’t answer any of those questions. While growing up at the orphanage he was often bullied by the older kids and tried avoiding most contact with them by hiding in the orphanage library reading books. He loved reading comics and stories about amazing superheroes that could save the world and protect people, everyone loved them and he wanted to be just like those superheroes, obviously thought that was impossible since superheroes don’t really exist. That was what he thought however at about the age of fourteen Austin was reading his superhero comics as usual when he heard a faint whisper calling his name, curious he followed the sound and found that it was coming from a book. Hesitantly he grabbed the book and looked at the cover, it had an odd writing that Austin had never seen before in his life. And that was the strange part; he had never seen the type of writing on the book in his life however he could read it perfectly. The book read ‘Spell Book’ and the bottom of the book had in smaller writing ‘please open’. Being the stupid little kid with no sense of caution as Austin was he opened the book, releasing a yellow aura that his body absorbed.

It wasn’t until about a week later that Austin learnt of his new powers. While he had grown up quite a bit the older kids still loved to give him a hard time. While trying to defend himself from one of the bullied Austin formed a yellow energy shield between him and the offender. Austin didn’t believe it was him until the shield dropped and the surprised bully charged at him, resulting in Austin sending a beam of energy towards the bully and propelling him backwards. Impressed by his new abilities Austin read the spell book and started practicing some of the magic inside it, he soon learnt that he could summon the book at any time by using his magic energy to materialize it. After he was confident with his abilities in magic he began to protect his area from crime under his new guise as Wizard. As soon as he was legally allowed to live by himself he moved out of the orphanage to live in Silver City.

About Him/Her
Personality: Austin likes to think of himself as an open book, he doesn’t try hiding anything about his personality, which consists of several major qualities, but more let’s people see different parts of his personality depending on how much he knows them. By default Austin acts cheerful and friendly when first meeting anyone, he is optimistic and aims to please as to make a good impression. Once he’s more comfortable with the person he becomes more laid back and easy going around them. He likes to tell bad jokes and puns around his friends and on occasion will randomly start singing some of his favourite songs. Only his best friends get to see his quirky and stubborn sides as he like proving his point or dancing around while listening to music depending on the occasion. Wizard is as much a wisecrack as Austin is however he also can and will act serious if he needs to. He likes to talk during his fights in order to distract his enemies, sometimes psycho-analyzing them to get on their nerves. He’s preferred method of battling is to attack from afar however he is still accustomed to close ranged combat.
Occupation: Barista at Quick Bean

Likes:
-Mystery
-Upbeat Music
-Fancy Dress Parties
-Dancing
-Mythology
Dislikes:
-Obnoxious people
-Silence
-Stupidity
-‘Fake’ Magic (Requiring a wand)
Hobbies: Writing Mystery Stories
Fears: Having his power used to hurt people. Being rejected
Talents: Talented Actor

Appearance
Height: 173 cm
Skin Tone: Fair, slightly pale
Eye Color: Blue (normal) Yellow (Ussirian Form)
Hair Description:
- Color: Blond
- Length: short
- Style: Slightly spikey

Relationships
Father + Mother: Unknown (Assumed Deceased)
Siblings: Ethan Motto (Older brother, true Ussirian, never met.)
Nephew: Unbeknown to Austin he has a nephew who inherited his powers on Ussiria.
Son: Austin’s son, Zach, traveled from the future to become the hero Animal.


Hero Information
Code Name: Wizard
Place of Origin: Ussiria (An energy dimension)
Residence: Leviathan Guild Hall
Affiliations: Leviathan/Order of Sorcerers
Powers and Abilities:
-Flight
-Energy Manipulation
-Magic
With enough energy Austin can enter an Ussirian form in which he is made up of pure energy and his powers are dramatically increased.
Weapons: Magic Spell Book
Weaknesses:
-Can’t casts spells while unfocused
-Vulnerable while casting spells
-Needs spell book to cast complex spells
-Naïve
-Ussirian Form can kill Austin
-Austin will die if he uses up all his magic energy
Austin’s spell book only ever shows several spells at a time and only those that he has the magic capability to preform.

Extra Information
Quotes: “I won’t give up…NOT UNTIL I DIE!”
Theme Song: Superhero
Favourite:
-Food: Lasagna/Potato Bake
-Drink: Hot Cocoa
-Color: Yellow
-Animal: Harp Seal
121.title: Wizard

125.content: There are plenty more heroes to follow!
125.title: Together We Stand 2

13.content: It's time to show those male heroes that us girls can do everything they can but better!
13.title: Who Run The World? GIRLS!

info.brief_description: The great Leviathan Guild, the greatest team of teen heroes to protect the world from evil
info.description: Leviathan was created by a group of teen superheroes for the sole purpose of defending earth from any threat. The team of originally seven members has expanded. Follow and create the story of the original members or create your own superheroes and their journey to protect the world, or take the path of evil and plot to destroy the world!
